insert into EVENT( ID , NAME , AUTHOR_ID , AUTHOR_CODE , AUTHOR_NAME , PLACE_ID , PLACE_NAME , START_TIME , END_TIME , YN_VALID , YN_PUBLIC , CONTENT , TYPE , REMIND_TYPE , SHARED_USER_IDS , SHARED_USER_CODES , SHARED_USER_NAMES , NOTE , ATTRIBUTE_01 , ATTRIBUTE_02 , ATTRIBUTE_03 , ATTRIBUTE_04 , ATTRIBUTE_05 , ATTRIBUTE_06 , ATTRIBUTE_07 , ATTRIBUTE_08 , ATTRIBUTE_09 , ATTRIBUTE_10 , SECRET_LEVEL , ORG_IDENTITY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DEPT , CREATION_DATE , LAST_UPDATED_BY , LAST_UPDATE_DATE , LAST_UPDATE_IP , VERSION , REMIND_DURATION )
select #{item.id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.name,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.authorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.authorCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.authorName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.placeId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.placeName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.startTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.endTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.ynValid,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.ynPublic,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.content,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.type,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.remindType,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.sharedUserIds,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.sharedUserCodes,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.sharedUserNames,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.note,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute01,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute02,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute03,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute04,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute05,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute06,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute07,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute08,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute09,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.attribute10,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.secretLevel,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.createdDept,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.version,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.remindDuration,jdbcType = DECIMAL} from dual
mapper.update:
update EVENT
ID = #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
NAME = #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
AUTHOR_ID = #{authorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
AUTHOR_CODE = #{authorCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
AUTHOR_NAME = #{authorName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
PLACE_ID = #{placeId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
PLACE_NAME = #{placeName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
YN_VALID = #{ynValid,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
YN_PUBLIC = #{ynPublic,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
REMIND_TYPE = #{remindType,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
SHARED_USER_IDS = #{sharedUserIds,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
SHARED_USER_CODES = #{sharedUserCodes,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
SHARED_USER_NAMES = #{sharedUserNames,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_01 = #{attribute01,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_02 = #{attribute02,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_03 = #{attribute03,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_04 = #{attribute04,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_05 = #{attribute05,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_06 = #{attribute06,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_07 = #{attribute07,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_08 = #{attribute08,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_09 = #{attribute09,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
ATTRIBUTE_10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
SECRET_LEVEL = #{secretLevel,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ORG_IDENTITY = #{orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATED_DEPT = #{createdDept,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
LAST_UPDATE_IP = #{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
VERSION = version+1 ,
REMIND_DURATION = #{remindDuration,jdbcType = DECIMAL}
where id = #{id} and version = #{version}
